titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 773) to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to extend the authorizations of appropriations for that Act, and to make technical corrections.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Minge. Petition No: 106-9.

bill.summary: 4/13/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 773 (Older Americans Act of 1965 reauthorization).
